title: Ticket #3358: schedd crash at ligo
description:
condor_schedd versino 7.8.6 has crashed with exit status 1 on the following system, 

[root@ldas-pcdev1 ~]# condor_version
$CondorVersion: 7.8.6 Oct 24 2012 BuildID: 73238 $
$CondorPlatform: x86_64_rhap_6.3 $

with the following stack trace, 

(gdb) where
#0  0x00000000004d88e4 in WriteCoreDump ()
#1  0x00007f034f95d498 in linux_sig_coredump(int) () from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_8_6.so
#2  <signal handler called>
#3  0x000000396b01f879 in classad::ClassAd::Clear() () from /usr/lib64/libclassad.so.3
#4  0x000000396b01fc64 in classad::ClassAd::~ClassAd() () from /usr/lib64/libclassad.so.3
#5  0x00007f034f8c8049 in compat_classad::ClassAd::~ClassAd() () from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_8_6.so
#6  0x00007f034f8c1834 in KeyCache::remove(char const*) () from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_8_6.so
#7  0x00007f034f975fb0 in DaemonCore::HandleProcessExit(int, int) () from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_8_6.so
#8  0x00007f034f9762e9 in DaemonCore::HandleDC_SERVICEWAITPIDS(int) () from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_8_6.so
#9  0x00007f034f9783a4 in DaemonCore::Driver() () from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_8_6.so
#10 0x00007f034f95edb0 in dc_main(int, char**) () from /usr/lib64/condor/libcondor_utils_7_8_6.so
#11 0x00000035c8a1ecdd in __libc_start_main () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#12 0x00000000004488a9 in _start ()
remarks:
2012-Dec-19 09:30:47 by johnkn:
Bulk change of target version from v070807 to v070808 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2013-Mar-28 17:16:00 by johnkn:
Bulk change of target version from v070808 to v070809 using ./ticket-target-mover.
